message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000.  I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is a very fair price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9,800? I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get as close to my target as possible.
